title: The HUAWEI FreeClip 2 match surprisingly great sound quality with an open design
summary: The sound quality of the HUAWEI FreeClip 2 open earbuds surprised me.
body: Open earbuds have taken the audio world by storm in recent years. Many major brands are launching products that promise to let you listen to music anytime, anywhere, while also staying aware of your surroundings. HUAWEI is already onto the second generation of its open earbuds, the FreeClip, and this new version feels more refined than any other open earbuds Iโve tried. While some issues with open earbuds are unavoidable (such as the lack of noise canceling), HUAWEI has taken major strides when it comes to comfort, sound quality, and features. Does that make the FreeClip 2 earbuds worth the high asking price? Well, that depends on a few things, starting with your sense of fashion.
